attributes.action: Please change the law so that ex Euro Comissioners dont get a £234,000 pay out when they leave
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
From BBC Web site
"Peter Mandelson will continue to receive taxpayer-funded EU pay worth £234,000 over three years - in addition to his annual ministerial salary of £104,386."

"When he reaches the age of 65, Mr Mandelson will receive a pension, starting at £31,000 and then rising in line with the cost of living."

"A private sector worker who wanted to ensure a similar income in retirement would have to build a pension fund worth more than £700,000. "

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the EU Commission.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
